feed.title: Tipi Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.7.2
entry.content:
Release notes

Fixes - Fix a bug that would try to set response headers after the response was sent - Add back legacy db migrations in case a user updates by jumping versions

Improvements - Add the ability to control timeouts in settings.json - Improve error handling in the backend

Technical - Bump dependencies

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.7.2

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.7.4
entry.content:
Release notes

Fixes - Missing traefik labels for apps generated with new JSON format

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.7.4

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.7.5
entry.content:
Release notes

Fixes - A concurrency issue in the queue was making all the events stuck and timeout until restarting the instance - An error handling issue was stopping the auto pulling of the app store from working

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.7.5

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.

entry.title: New release for Tipi: v3.8.0
entry.content:
Release notes

Features - Extended the docker-compose.json specs to support more docker-compose options - [CLI] Add new version command to print the installed Runtipi version

Improvements - Cap the line number in .log.history files to max 10k lines and avoid ever-growing log files

Technical - Update traefik to version 3.2 - Update docker-compose to version 2.32.1

How to update

From the root folder of your Tipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v3.8.0

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 2 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.
